decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (EX1, EX2, EX3, EX4 (all rev B), received 26/03/2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The vehicle crossover shall be extended to a maximum width of no greater than 3.6m and shall be constructed in accordance with Hounslow Highways Policies and Guidelines.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension, creation of a vehicle hardstanding to the front of the property and creation of vehicle access
